overview: Madame Shy (Shy Love) wants to retire and move to Hawaii with her lover. But first she needs to find a replacement to fill her slutty slot at her high class Hollywood escort service. She thinks she's found the perfect fit with Trixie (Lindsey Meadows), a ten dollar whore with million dollar aspirations. Trixie should work out just fine in Madame Shy's sex plan.
title: Diary Of A Call Girl
